reviews.review_msg: He is the choice if you want to learn. He knows his stuff. Student could learn a lot from his lectures but be ready to study really hard.
Dont have much to say, just avoid him at all cost.

Pay attention to his matrix method of solving for transfer functions. It is extremely useful if you can figure out how to apply it in later courses (ie. apply it to mechanical systems ini ENSC 383). He has many useful tricks. The final was not "unbelievable." Many things were slight variations of homework assignments and lecture examples.

If I could give a negative rating, I would, but unfortunately I can only go as low as 1. Boring and useless lectures. Go get any book on electric circuits and study from them: you'll learn so much more. Going to his lectures is a waste of time. What I do not get is why he is the only one teaching this course right now.
Avoid him at all cost, I also think he is over rated at 2.5 overall rate on here. He doesnt even deserve a one. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
he is THE WORST proff.. unbelievable. avoid him!!
Worst prof Ive met in SFU,Be advised,do not take any course with him,He assumes you know the lecture stuff,and there is also an unbelievble final in the end.
his all over the place, teaches many topics but doesn't cover them at all in any exam . he is only comfortable on what he knows around his notes . Shouldn't be teaching in SFU
Cant teach, Simply copies stuff from his notes on over head w/o explanation, useless tutorials, midterm avg was less than %40. Overall he shouldnt be teaching any material at SFU

VERY HARD prof. Boring lectures, midterm was reasonable but killer final. nothing from his notes or even close to what he did in class, he is getting too old to be teaching a fundamental course like ENSC 320
Great professor, really knows his stuff. Kinda looks like Red from "that 70's show"... Very helpful!
Boring lectures and hard exams
Great prof.

One of the worst profs I've ever had.  He fails to get even the simplest concepts across clearly in lecture, which leaves you researching for hours on how to solve his customized assignments.  His class resulted in the lowest grade I've received, and I do not think the concepts in 320 should be that difficult.  Avoid at all costs.

The drill instructor of Engineering. If you survive his class, you will be a weapon, a minister of Laplace praying for bode plots. He is hard, but he is fair. In his class, you are all equally worthless. Because he is hard, you will not like him, but the more you hate him the more you will learn.
He's not the greatest professor, but 320 isn't a hard course, all the materials are covered by the 2/3 of the semester. Learn locus diagram well, it'll help in 383, not altogether useless.

Don't know what is going on in this course. Assignment due alternate weeks and consist of one question which seems unsolvable. Doesn't post lecture notes online. Doesn't tell you what to read from the textbook.
JB's daily task includes explain sonars to little kids and kicking jack out of lab  thx to JOHN our lab is now clean on weekdays, but jack still invades on weekends :(

very logical person... but teaching skills are meh... he doesn't cover everything you need to know at all. A lot of things u have to learn on ur own, but i guess that's what engineering's about. GO UNDER WATER RESEARCH LAB.

is quite interested in the material, and seems very knowledgeable, however does not teach in a very clear manner, but rather will drown you in examples. Also will expect that you will remember practically every exercise he does in class. Not very flexible with the material... can't always tell what is the context of his examples.
No Comments
Dr. John Bird is a very good prof! His exams were very fair. All the questions he asks on exams are related to the assignments, and infact are less difficult than the assignments. Awesome prof!
Very strict rules on marking scheme. Will not scale. Very hard to get by this course.
Took ENSC 320 last year with him. The exams are easy (follow lecture notes closely). The textbooks are a good supplement but studying his notes would guarantee and A- or better.
I think he is pretty good! Make this course interesting! The only course that I actually understand something.
Makes lectures worth going to.  He has an odd personality, but overall an excellent prof.  (Reminds me of Mr. Lehy from Trailer Park Boys)
If u hav a chance dont bother taking a class with him. U'll not understand 90% of what he's trying to say n during the rest 10% u missed lecture. So even if u attend lectures, won't help a bit.

your marks depend on the TA you are assigned. He believes the world is unfair, so the marking can be unfair too and doesn't make an attempt to scale the marks between TA. (i somewhat admire this even though i didn't get the easy TA)
boring lecture, hard tests
A very intelligent guy. His talking during the lecture seems boring, but he actually does a lot of trash talk. His exams are not really hard if you do pay attention in class.
"You Shall Not Pass!" - this guy is hard ! his exams are hard! plus the material is hard! but he's a nice guy, pretty friendly old man, and knows his stuff well
his history and projects sounds legendary. his class is ok.
Most boring class ever! Please, the point of the class was to learn about engineering and society, to think and stuff, not too memorize pointless facts.
good teacher, just super ultra boring material.. By the end of the semester (if u still show up), he'll make u wanna work in da submarine.
Obsessed with his underwater stuff... and extremely boring... and no point of going class cuz he is so easy!
The more spiritual, philosophical and intelligent engineer/prof. Might be boring to the most, but very insightful and interesting to some.
No Comments
No Comments
No Comments
Very intelligent guy. He may not teach well, but he can really help you out if you have any personal problems. Very nice prof.
He tries to communicate some important issues. Course is tideous at times.
I didn't learn anything from his lecture in this past semester.. boring..sucks
, anwell, his lecturesd very boring....he should retire by now
not clear... always talk bout underwater stuff
sometimes boring / sometimes funny , very very unpredictable
No Comments

He is absolutely boring.
No Comments
Expects students to be REAL work
